member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ExpressionLightTheme
member.summary: Implicitly applies the Expression light theme to all of its descendent FrameworkElements.
member.remarks: The theme is applied using ImplicitStyleManager.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Theming.ExpressionLightTheme.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ExpressionLightTheme class.
